name: Geometry Jump Level
summary: Learn about .GJL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Geometry Jump is a game where players guide a square-shaped character through challenging levels filled with spikes, gaps, and other obstacles by tapping or clicking to jump at the right time. The game features rhythm-based gameplay, as jumps often need to be synchronized with the background music.

GJL files are common within the Geometry Jump community. Geometry Jump players often create custom levels in the game, export them as GJL files, and share them with others, who can then load the files into the game.

description: A GJL file is a game level used by Geometry Jump, a game similar to Geometry Dash. It stores plain text data that defines a playable level, including the layout of square bricks, spike blocks, portals, and other interactive objects. GJL files may also contain information about the background, music track, and gameplay speed for the level.

instructions: You can open GJL files with Geometry Jump by uploading them to the online game. To open the files, click the hammer and wrench icon, select SAVED LEVELS, click the arrow icon, and choose the GJL file you would like to upload.
